description.english: Luckily I didn’t give up. All the stuff are collected finally!
description.schinese: 终于等到集齐，还好我没放弃

description.english: To eradicate his weak point he cut off his leg
description.schinese: 为了消除唯一的弱点，他砍断了自己的腿

description.english: Which engraved the spell of eternity
description.schinese: 上面篆刻着代表永恒的咒语

description.english: Run fast enough so that the loneliness fails to catch you
description.schinese: 跑得够快，孤独就追不上你

description.english: Why would someone change the lock whenever i find the key to success
description.schinese: 为什么每当我找到成功的钥匙，就有人把锁给换了

description.english: Insist on your dream and you can fly without wings
description.schinese: 坚持自己的梦想，即使没有翅膀也能飞翔

description.english: It takes more courage to bear the pain than death
description.schinese: 承受痛苦，比死亡更需要勇气

description.english: How awesome to own a dragon as your pet!
description.schinese: 拥有一条龙做宠物，这是多么酷炫的事

description.english: It is a bless and a curse
description.schinese: 既是一种祝福，也是一种诅咒

description.english: What a monster should do is to destroy the world, isn’t it?
description.schinese: 所谓怪物该干的事，难道不就是毁灭世界么

description.english: Its protein content is eight times than beef
description.schinese: 蛋白质含量是牛肉的8倍

description.english: So heavy we have to drag
His past life is an archer
Time is a handful of fodder
Whenever I show my knife I always fails to hit the target

description.schinese: 嘘，你们看 ，我发现了什么？

description.english: Let it go, let it go
"Put down your arms and hand your souls."
"Oh, my gosh! You are so tall!"
We can’t sure the last thing left is the hope
description.schinese: 被留到最后的，可不一定是希望啊

description.english: "Take care of my wealth I will check it when you get there!"
description.schinese: “把我的财富照顾好，到那边来向我交账！”

description.english: "Don’t try to compare the laziness with me I am too lazy to compare with you."
"Do you come here for business or for fun?"
description.schinese: “你是来办正事儿，还是找乐子?”

description.english: "Don’t look at me you the little ants"
The taste of chicken chomping chomping
I am waiting someone who trusts me like you
description.schinese: 我一直在等待，像你一样相信我的人

description.english: It is a proper metaphor that love likes a hurricane. After all I haven’t seen one ever
description.schinese: 爱情就像龙卷风，很贴切 ，毕竟我从未见过龙卷风

description.english: The edge of the brade engraved the epigraph of "6200"

description.schinese: “我喜欢面具，因为面具不会哭。”

description.english: "The midnight with pumpkin carriage, the crystal shoes of Cinderella"
description.schinese: “南瓜马车的午夜，灰姑娘的玻璃鞋。”

description.english: Tao that can be spoken of is not true one
The three begets all things of the world
description.schinese: 道生一，一生二，二生三，三生万物

description.english: "There is no need to argue. You would know who is true when you die."
description.schinese: “多说无用，到底谁才是正确的，等你死了就会知道了。”

description.english: Born from the same mother. Why slaughter each so frightfully?
description.schinese: 本是同根生，相煎何太急

description.english: "I am glad you know it . Be wise and go back!"
description.schinese: “知道就好，识相的就给我退下！”

description.english: Have a dream. If you want to be a hero you should have a dream.
description.schinese: 要有梦想，想成为英雄的话，就一定要有梦想

description.english: Those monsters have occupied the city. However, I survived.
description.schinese: 那些怪物已经占领了城市，不过，我还活着

description.english: If you want to win you have to experience a lot!
description.schinese: 想要赌赢钱，刀山火海走三遍

description.english: Not the duang that something changes into other thing only can be regarded as a miracle
description.schinese: 不是 Duang 的一声一些东西变成其他东西才是奇迹

description.english: A belated blessing Merry Christmas! Bonbon!
Special  fashion awesome thing brushing strange we can win!
description.schinese: 与众不同最时尚刷怪肯定棒

description.english: His face likes a crab, his beard likes copper line.
Everything is so dim, and everything is shaking
With the string being played. Wind and fire all comehere.
From the rib come the moths they eat all human until death
"But I want a heart, because it makes someone happy."
description.schinese: “我却要得到一颗心，因为心能使一个人快乐。”

description.english: "The king of animal shouldn’t be a chicken."
description.schinese: “百兽之王不应该是一个胆小鬼。”

description.english: After all tomorrow is another brand new day
description.schinese: 毕竟，明天又是全新的一天

description.english: The garden planted various kinds of precious creatures
description.schinese: 种植各种珍奇植物的花园

description.english: Collect a number of rare ancient books
The smelter of blood and fire
The place gathering moist,darkness and ghosts
description.schinese: 潮湿、阴暗，幽鬼盘踞之地

description.english: The topside floor of the tower of Babel seems to hide some secrets
description.schinese: 巴别塔最上层，似乎隐藏着秘密

description.english: The manager of Babel who can fore see the future
description.schinese: 巴别塔的管理者，能够预知未来

description.english: The first of Four Heavenly Kings
The second of Four Heavenly Kings
The third of Four Heavenly Kings
The fourth of Four Heavenly Kings
The father of Alexander, the ruler of Babel
description.schinese: 亚历山大的父亲，巴别塔的主人

description.english: Any stories starts from here and ends from here
description.schinese: 一切故事在这开始，在这结束

description.english: Please take care of little animals
Money is not everything. But without money you can do nothing.
description.schinese: 钱不是万能的，但没有钱是万万不能的

description.english: Getting this you can pass the level
The top soldiers fight with wisdom, the second with diplomacy, the third with army and the last with siege
description.schinese: 上兵伐谋，其次伐交，其次伐兵，其下攻城

description.english: There is no place can be compared with a home
description.schinese: 没有一个地方可以和家相提并论

description.english: My destiny is decided by myself

description.schinese: 以迅雷不及掩耳盗铃儿响叮当仁不让之势

description.english: Holding a cup of wine I ask the blue sky
description.schinese: 明月几时有，把酒问青天

description.english: The first step in a thousand march

description.schinese: 一套古老的黑色的战具

description.english: A magical fishing rod with which can catch fish from the galaxy
description.schinese: 能从银河里钓起美味鱼儿的神奇鱼竿

description.english: Made with damascus steel, very sharp
description.schinese: 由大马士革钢制成，十分锋利

description.english: Old helmet, defensive performance is good
description.schinese: 古老的头盔，防御性能不错

description.english: Old armor, defensive performance is very good
description.schinese: 古老的铠甲，防御性能很好

description.english: Ancient carving the fuzzy words "... contract ... guardian of life"
description.schinese: 篆刻着模糊的古代文字“生命的。。。护者。。契约”

description.english: Two laps around the tower of Babel
description.schinese: 连起来能绕巴别塔两圈

description.english: Looks like from a magic dictionary
description.schinese: 看起来像是从一本魔法典中撕下来的

description.english: Always collected to make expensive dress
description.schinese: 常被收集制作昂贵的服饰

description.english: Will be extremely fast and deadly creatures after growth
description.schinese: 成长后会成为速度极快的致命生物
